text: The Trofeo Luigi Fagioli Hillclimb is a hillclimbing competition held in Gubbio, Italy. The course is in length. The track hosts a round of the Italian Hill Climb Championship also known as Campionato Italiano Velocità Montagna (CIVM). == History == The trophy was born in 1966 in honour of the Italian driver Luigi Fagioli. == List of winners == === By modern cars === Classification: {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" |- !
